name: Disposable Alcohol Tester
description: Disposable Alcohol Tester – is designed for morning after use to give an indication of how intoxicated your currently are. Only use this device 1 hour after your last alcohol cinsumption as you need to give your body time to absorb the alcohol before testing. Everyone’s metabolism is different so the longer you leave between the last consumption and testing better result you will recieve.

name: Hangover Help
description: Hangover Help is an exceptional and all-natural product, which helps to effectively fight the harmful effects produced by alcohol consumption. In a nutshell if you suffer from hangover and need to work the next day they HANGOVER HELP is the perfect solution for you. As a natural and healthy answer to responsible drinking, Hangover Help: 路 Reduces blood alcohol levels in about 30 minutes. 路 Restores motor skills impaired by alcohol. 路 Protects the brain, liver and stomach from the damaging effects of alcohol. 路 Stimulates carbohydrate metabolism in the liver. Fully proven, tested and certified for selling in Europe. Hangover Help (2 capsules per individual unit) – which need to be take 30 minutes BEFORE your initial alcohol consumption, this helps the body prepare itself for alcohol recycling in the body.
